sn5.3:1.2: Atha kho kisagotami bhikkhuni pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
sn5.3:1.3: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena andhavanam tenupasankami, upasankamitva divaviharaya.
sn5.3:1.4: Andhavanam ajjhogahetva annatarasmim rukkhamule divaviharam nisidi.
sn5.3:1.5: Atha kho maro papima kisagotamiya bhikkhuniya bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo samadhimha cavetukamo yena kisagotami bhikkhuni tenupasankami; upasankamitva kisagotamim bhikkhunim gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn5.3:3.2: “ko nu khvayam manusso va amanusso va gatham bhasati”ti?
sn5.3:3.4: “maro kho ayam papima mama bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo samadhimha cavetukamo gatham bhasati”ti.
sn5.3:4.1: Atha kho kisagotami bhikkhuni “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathahi paccabhasi:
sn5.3:7.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam kisagotami bhikkhuni”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
